name: HSP_ACCT_ALT_DRGS
description: This table stores the multiple Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) information for the alternate ICD code set when dual coding a hospital account.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the hospital account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ALT_DRG_ID_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the ID Type associated with this diagnosis related group ID for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_DRG_ID_TYPE_ID_ID_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ID Type.

columns.name: ALT_DRG_QLFR_C_NAME
columns.description: Additional diagnosis-related group (DRG) Qualifier for the DRG Type and Code for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_DRG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the diagnosis-related group (DRG) code for the alternate code set that is associated with this hospital account.

columns.name: ALT_DRG_ID_DRG_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Diagnoses Related Group name.

columns.name: ALT_DRG_BILL_FLG_YN
columns.description: Indicates the diagnosis-related group (DRG) that is the primary Billing DRG for the hospital account for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_DRG_REIMB
columns.description: Stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG) reimbursement for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_DRG_MDC_VALUE
columns.description: Stores the Major Diagnostic Category (MDC) values for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_DRG_WEIGHT
columns.description: Stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG) weight for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_DRG_PS_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the severity of index (SOI) for the diagnosis-related group (DRG) for the alternate code set.
entries: Principal Dx Used for SOI/ROM Calc

columns.name: ALT_DRG_SHORT_LOS
columns.description: Stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG) short length of stay (LOS) for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_DRG_LONG_LOS
columns.description: Stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG) long length of stay (LOS) for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_DRG_AMLOS
columns.description: Stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG) arithmetic mean length of stay (LOS) for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_DRG_GMLOS
columns.description: Stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG) geometric mean length of stay (LOS) for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_CST_OTLR_THRSH
columns.description: Stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG) cost outlier threshold for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_DAY_OTLR_THRSH
columns.description: Stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG) day outlier threshold for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_OUTLIER_DAYS
columns.description: Stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG) outlier days for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_OTLR_CST_AMT
columns.description: Stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG) outlier cost for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_OUTLIER_REIMB
columns.description: Stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG) outlier reimbursement amount for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_PAT_STATUS
columns.description: Stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG) reimbursement indicator for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_DISP_SHARE_ADJ
columns.description: Stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG) disproportionate share amount for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_IND_MED_AMT
columns.description: Stores the indirect medicated monetary amount for the alternate diagnosis-related group (DRG) on the hospital account.

columns.name: ALT_CAPITAL_AMT
columns.description: This item stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG) capital amount for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_DRG_TOT_CHG
columns.description: Stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG) total charges on claim for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_DRG_LOS
columns.description: Stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG) length of stay (LOS) for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_NRM_PT_RMB_AMT
columns.description: Stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG) normal patient reimbursement for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_TG_FED_BLND_RT
columns.description: Stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG) target federal blended rate for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_DRG_COND_CODE
columns.description: Stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG) condition code for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_DRG_FORMULA
columns.description: Stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG) formula for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_DRG_COMMENT
columns.description: Stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG) comment for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_DRG_ROM_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the risk of mortality (ROM) for the diagnosis-related group (DRG) for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_OL_REIMB_AMT
columns.description: Stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG) outlier amount for the alternate code set.

columns.name: ALT_OUTLIER_TYPE
columns.description: Stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG) outlier type for the alternate code set.
